scripts.template:engineering: mkdir -p output/engineering && hackmyresume build resume.json TO output/engineering/will-weaver-resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-engineering

scripts.template:latte: mkdir -p output/latte && hackmyresume build resume.json TO output/latte/will-weaver-resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-latte
